title: SHAH RUKH KHAN’S FAN CREATED SUSPICION ABOUT HIM.
content: Onlanka News – By Walter Jayawardhana Shah Rukh Khan has all types of admirers who love him.  One of them was not only happened to be a terrorist and loved  to use Sharuk ‘s name as an alias and that would have made the Bollywood star attract the attention from airport officials in the US…
